content:
```xml
<repairs>
DEL_EDGE | [rm] | -
</repairs>
```

This repair operation removes the relationship `TAKES_MEDICATION` between the patient `Sanford861` and the medication `Plavix 75 MG Oral Tablet`, as it contains an ingredient `clopidogrel` to which the patient is allergic. This ensures that the patient does not take a medicine containing an allergen.
